name: ISOMUSE: The Quest for Harmony
description:
ISOMUSE is 3D puzzle game about adventure, puzzles and music. Control Clef, Treble and Bass together to solve puzzles and explore a beautiful, shattered landscape of islands floating high in the sky.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • Split into two characters and control them together
  • Cooperate with yourself to solve puzzles
  • Collect Music Fragments to add to the soundtrack
  • Original Orchestral soundtrack
  • 20 - 30 minutes of gameplay

Created in 14 weeks as a student project at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment.

Chai Break Studios is:

  • Tessa Touchette - Designer, Project Lead
  • Daniel D'Onofrio - Designer, Composer, Sound Design
  • Benjamin Hinckley - Designer
  • Isla Combridge - Programmer
  • Renae  Aurisch - Programmer
  • Alec Luke - Artist
  • Sophie Cassidy - Artist
  • Jesse - Lead Sound Designer
